But at least Hikaru has a beautiful voice and can sing, unlike bloody Britney). And "Hikki" (that´s what she´s called by her fans) is really cute and gorgeous. Don´t you want to see her GTS story?
1552222.title: Hikaru Utada?

choices: Hikki grows to gigantic size, and you´re somewhere on her body!
15522221.content:
Now that was an exciting day. You´re Thomas, an ordinary 20-year old guy, and you are a huge fan of the japanese pop star Hikaru Utada. Not only because she has an amazing voice, but also because of her beauty. She´s really cute, always with that innocent facial expression of hers. Luckily, you were able to see her live in concert in Tokyo, but thst´s not all. You were also able to meet her in person, due to a fortunate turn of events: since you really like her music, you sent her an e-mail with some kind words via her official website. And not only did you receive an answer, but also an invitation to her concert in Tokyo. And more importantly, she invited you to spend the evening together with her. Only because of some kind and polite words you wrote in an e-mail.
Anyway, after you and Hikki went to a restaurant for dinner, you decided to walk a little through Tokyo. It was your first time to Tokyo, and and experiencing it together with Hikki sounded like a great idea. Until that very moment.
"It was really a nice evening so far, Thomas."
"Thank you, Miss Utada. I enjoyed it as well."
"Please, call me Hikki. That sounds cuter."
"All right, Hikki."
Just then you saw a small, strange bottle in her pocket.
"What´s that?"
"Huh? Well, I don´t know exactly. A fan of mine send me that bottle along with a note: "That potion will change your life, Hikki!"
"Potion?"
"Yeah, sounds strange. You know, I guess I take a gulp."
"You´re sure?"
"Yep. I don´t think it´s poisonous."
So Hikki took the bottle and drank its content in one single gulp. Then she patted her belly.
"So? How was it?"
"Hm...tastes like some juice. Nothing terribly excit---"
Suddenly, her stomach began to growl loudly, and it obviously hurt.
"Hikki, you´re all right?"
"Uh...my tummy..."
She held her belly in pain and fell onto her knees. Then the incredible happened.
15522221.title: An evening with Hikaru Utada

155222222222222221.content:
In the midst of her time in Las Vegas, Jennifer Lopez has just finished another show. She had finished it feeling the same way as usual- angry that audiences were becoming more sparse and mostly comprising of drunk, horny men.
You knew the routine by now. You delivered her some pills- of what, you never knew- and a specific type of bottled water. You arrived in her dressing room at the same time every night, and this night was no different.
You bright her the stuff as usual, and she took it as usual. What was unusual was that she actually stopped you before you left the room this time.
"Have you ever wondered about these pills and this specific type of water?" she asked you.
"I have thought about it," you said, "but, I always figured it was none of my business."
"I want to show you," she said as she took your hand and led you to the stage in the empty auditorium.
"Those are an experiment," she elaborates. "Let's just say that there's a reason I still have this figure. If I'm correct, I'm now past the threshold of full fledged goddess."
You look at her dubiously.
"Allow me to demonstrate," she said as you notice her start to grow slightly. "I have been planning this for a while. I want to do more of this in front of the next audience."

"Like what you see?" she asked you, trying to get you out of your trance.

"Good," she said. "I knew you would. That's why I let you in on it. I have arranged the next show so that everything will be proportional to my old height with one new prop added. Wait and see."
Indeed, with the next show, many of her usual props were made to make her seem normal. Much of the audience- drunk and horny men as usual- shrugged off any perceptions to their state. They were too focused on her stage attire- a black bikini top, a black thong, and black thigh high boots.

With that, she started to grow again, still on top of the model. The crowd stands up, not believing what they are seeing. You look on from backstage, loving the show. She grew until she was...

15522222222222222112.content:
As she grew, the audience just stood there in shock, hardly believing their eyes. You stood there in awe, admiring this great beauty growing. Jennifer stood there in ecstasy, loving every bit of this feeling, including the stage attire ripping off of her like it was tissue paper.
She only stepped off of the model building when it started to give way. When she got back on the stage, she was already 30 feet tall and counting. It was only then that audience snapped out of their initial shock and started going for the exits. Not wanting to lose her audience, the still growing entertainer literally picked up the model like it was a feather and tossed it to the back, blocking the main entrance. She then tossed the other oversized props, blocking the emergency exits.
With the auditorium now blocked, she finally stopped her growth at 50 feet tall. She looked upon her audience with her hands on her hips and a wicked grin across her face.
"So, you are the types I have been entertaining all this time?" she observed. "Well, now I'm only going to entertain for my pleasure."

15522222222222222112.title: Trapped
